# user-installed opkg packages (8)
# main packages (7)
bash
htop
libcap-bin
luci-app-sqm
luci-theme-material
smartmontools
tailscale

# LuCI translations (1)
luci-i18n-firewall-ru

opkg update
opkg install bash htop libcap-bin luci-app-sqm luci-theme-material smartmontools tailscale
opkg install luci-i18n-firewall-ru
